title: Can an undertaker sell your body parts? You might want to check! 13 kids suffer parents' house of horrors
itunes:title: Can an undertaker sell your body parts? You might want to check! 13 kids suffer parents' house of horrors
description:
Is it legal for a funeral home to sell your loved one's body parts and gold teeth? Nancy Grace is surprised to learn that it is legal in many cases in some states. Funeral law expert Wendy Weiner, lawyer & child advocate Ashley Willcott, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, and reporter John Lemley look at what a Colorado undertaker is accused of doing. A California couple is jailed after police found a dozen of their children chained to beds in malnourished in their suburban home. Nancy and her experts discuss the case against David Allen Turpin and Louise Anna Turpin, who are charged with torture and child endangerment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
